summary: A day-in-the-life dark comedy concerning a group of islanders, their respective secrets, and one man's plan to kill himself quietly.
cast: James Allodi|Callum Keith Rennie|Elliot Page|Rebecca Jenkins|Sandra Oh|Paul Gross|Marcella Grimaux|Daniel MacIvor|Terri Sanderson|Chris Saunderson|Caleb Langille|Patrick Keeler|Maury Chaykin|Chett Buchanan|Mike Goodfellow|Mary Ellen MacLean|Ed Cayer|Devon Chisholm|Judith Hasen|Kathryn MacLellan|Rita Howell|Lauren Ehrenworth|Susannah Hoffmann|Deborah Bowles|Lorraine Chapman|Gil Anderson|Allan Hawco|Shannon Perreault|Hannah Gross|Jack Gross
title: Wilby Wonderful
